video.title: Maron
video.synopsis: Marc Maron stars as Marc Maron, who interviews fellow comedians for his popular podcast, only to reveal more about his own neuroses and relationships.

episodes.synopsis: Marc is tormented by an abusive "fan" on Twitter. With his podcast guest Dave Foley in tow, Marc decides to teach one Internet troll a lesson.
episodes.title: Internet Troll

episodes.synopsis: While Denis Leary is on the podcast, Marc's manhood is put into question. This conversation fuels Marc to tackle a home improvement problem.
episodes.title: Dead Possum

episodes.synopsis: Marc's estranged dad, Larry, reappears with an RV and a foolproof plan to get rich. Power struggles ensue, both literally and figuratively.
episodes.title: Marc's Dad

episodes.synopsis: Reeling from news of his ex-wife's new baby, Marc decides to get back on the market. His pal Illeana Douglas attempts to set him up with a nice girl.
episodes.title: Dominatrix

episodes.synopsis: Burned once again by a much younger chick, Marc decides to try dating an age-appropriate woman.
episodes.title: A Real Woman

episodes.synopsis: At an AA meeting, Marc becomes a sponsor to Manny, an ex-con. While visiting Manny's old haunts to make amends, Marc finds himself in over his head.
episodes.title: Sponsor

episodes.synopsis: Marc receives a lewd photo from a female fan who suggests a weekend of no-strings-attached sex at an out-of-town comedy festival.
episodes.title: Sex Fest

episodes.synopsis: Marc is distraught after finding out his Sexfest fling Jen plans to move too close for comfort. So Jen sets her sights on the next best thing.
episodes.title: Jen Moves to L.A

episodes.synopsis: Marc has lunch with a flashy filmmaker friend who offers him a dubious part in his upcoming movie.
episodes.title: Projections

episodes.synopsis: When Jen moves in on Marc's domain, he seeks advice from podcast guest Adam Scott. As tensions mount, a stranger puts things in perspective.
episodes.title: Mexican Angel

episodes.synopsis: Comedian Sarah Silverman is a guest on Marc's podcast and his relationship with Jen goes into roller coaster mode because of an unfortunate joke.
episodes.title: Talking Dead

episodes.synopsis: A lonely Marc is thrilled when he makes friends with comedian Ray Romano, but is subsequently peeved when Kyle points out the talent gap between them.
episodes.title: Marc's New Friend

episodes.synopsis: A romantically challenged Jen and Marc try to soothe their relationship by seeking help from pair of married therapists - with disasterous results.
episodes.title: Therapy

episodes.synopsis: A conniving Marc's plot to pawn off his visiting mom on a pal's dad backfires when the mature couple actually hit it off - a little too well.
episodes.title: The Mom Situation

episodes.synopsis: When his cat Boomer disappears, it provides a diversion from Marc and Jen's failed romance -- and an opportunity to re-discover his neighborhood.
episodes.title: Boomer Lives

episodes.synopsis: Joined by comedian Caroline Rhea, Marc uses podcast time to confess about his failed relationship with Jen and to attempt a new tryst with Rhea.
episodes.title: Nostalgic Sex Buddy

episodes.synopsis: Marc's houseguests include his romantically devastated brother, his advice-giving parents and comedian David Cross, who gets everyone stoned.
episodes.title: Marc's Family

episodes.synopsis: Marc's creative juices are in turmoil when an upcoming gig inspires him to write new material, but fear of failure gives rise to performance anxiety.
episodes.title: Mouth Cancer Gig

episodes.synopsis: Fueled by shared bad-relationship stories, Marc and Rachael Harris might just have a love connection. That is, if Marc can prove he's past his anger.
episodes.title: Yoga Teacher

episodes.synopsis: While guesting on a typically awful morning radio show, Marc publically rants against the medium, but reconsiders when he meets a classic radio icon.
episodes.title: Radio Cowboy

episodes.synopsis: Fed up with life's chaos, Marc decides to simplify, starting with his vinyl-collecting hobby -- until a chance encounter casts a shadow over serenity.
episodes.title: White Truck

episodes.synopsis: After inadvertently poaching a joke from a stand-up colleague, Marc's guilt drives him to help the pal's career as penance for his comic cardinal sin.
episodes.title: The Joke

episodes.synopsis: Driven by his ever-present guilt and a troubled pal, a now successful Marc takes a road trip -- only to find that fame, fortune and life is fleeting.
episodes.title: Desert Road Trip

episodes.synopsis: Marc faces pressure to spend time with his girlfriend's kid and gets questionable career advice from his idol, Elliott Gould.
episodes.title: Stroke of Luck

episodes.synopsis: Marc weighs a request to help his lesbian neighbors conceive a child and puzzles over Kyle's relationship with an older woman.
episodes.title: The Request

episodes.synopsis: After learning his ex-wife has written a book, Marc invites her to come on the podcast, but the meeting stirs up painful memories.
episodes.title: Ex-Pod

episodes.synopsis: When he's criticized for not having black guests on his podcast, Marc visits a black comedy club and asks Bruce Bruce for an interview.
episodes.title: Racegate

episodes.synopsis: After two ill-timed outbursts, Marc decides to seek help for his anger problem and receives guidance from some unlikely sources.
episodes.title: Mad Marc

episodes.synopsis: While Marc wages an endless battle with his internet provider, his distraught father arrives and drops hints that he's dying.
episodes.title: The Node

episodes.synopsis: Eager to be the "cool uncle," Marc asks Andy Dick to help introduce his 15-year-old niece to one of her YouTube idols.
episodes.title: Marc's Niece

episodes.synopsis: A novelist pal asks Marc to give a lecture at the college where he teaches, but their friendship faces an unexpected test.
episodes.title: Professor of Desire

episodes.synopsis: As the pressure of filming his talk show pilot mounts, Marc starts taking antidepressants and experiences peculiar side effects.
episodes.title: Anti-Depressed

episodes.synopsis: When he's sued by a patent troll, Marc calls his fellow podcasters together to come up with a plan of attack.
episodes.title: Patent Troll

episodes.synopsis: Marc takes a high-paying gig at a corporate retreat as a favor to his brother, but has trouble keeping a lid on his disdain.
episodes.title: Steel Johnson

episodes.synopsis: As the shoot date for his talk show pilot looms, Marc decides to give up nicotine and caffeine and get in shape with help from pro wrestler CM Punk.
episodes.title: Cold Turkey

episodes.synopsis: When Marc starts popping oxycodone for back pain, his life spins out of control -- just in time for the debut of his new talk show.
episodes.title: Spiral
